Convert to Python Unicode Object

Convert to Python Unicode Object

py_unicode(str)

Arguments

str

Single element character vector to convert

Details

By default R character vectors are converted to Python strings. In Python 3 these values are unicode objects however in Python 2 they are 8-bit string objects. This function enables you to obtain a Python unicode object from an R character vector when running under Python 2 (under Python 3 a standard Python string object is returend).

Contents

  • Arguments
  • Details
